Pre-Game Insights: Senegal's coach, Aliou Cisse, was disappointed with the 1-1 draw in their previous game against Burkina Faso but defended the team's game plan.
Burundi comes into the match as Group L leaders after a 3-2 win over Malawi.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Senegal has won three out of four matches against Burundi, with their most recent meeting in June 2016 resulting in a 2-0 victory.
